item.title: Watchlists from The Movie Database
item.description: 1: API token for read access (v4 auth) Get API token on The Movie Database. Saved in local storage. 2: Get Watchlists (Mabye initilize to get a access token) Initialize Get Watchlists 3: Filter Provider with flatrate Movies Accept request token Confirm request token in new window for the access token from The Movie Database! Token confirmed

item.title: Trello tools
item.description: Delete archived cards on a trello board. Generate API key and token in Trello API key for developers. (Revoke token: Trello > Account > Applications) 1. Authorize API key API token Initialize 2. Board actions Board: List archived (Interactive) Remove archived (Just remove all) Status output:
